summary: After 40 years of unpredictable live shows, drug addictions & breakdowns, psychedelic folk rock legends, The Holy Modal Rounders survived one of the strangest careers in music
cast: Robert Christgau|Dennis Hopper|David Reisch|Robin Remailly|Sam Shepard|Peter Stampfel|Peter Tork|Dave Van Ronk|Loudon Wainwright III|Steve Weber
director: Directors: Sam Wainwright Douglas, Paul Lovelace
title: The Holy Modal Rounders: Bound to Lose
